title: SMC_CamTableEvaluate (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_CamTableEvaluate : BOOL
This function evaluates a cam table at a given master position.
It returns the respective slave position and its derivatives with
respect to the master position.
The function returns TRUE if the evaluation succeeded.

rows: The master position where the cam table should be evaluated

rows.Name: SlavePosition
rows.Comment: The cam slave position with respect to the master position

rows: The cam slave velocity with respect to the master position

The cam slave acceleration with respect to the master
position
The cam slave jerk with respect to the master position
Error identification if the function returns FALSE.
